prog4

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • prog4.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Simulation class handles all of the details of the simulation through a queue of customers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Simulation()
      Initializes all data values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Arrival()
      The Arrival function adds a customer onto the queue if it's not full.
      double avgTimeWait()
      The avgWaitTime function returns the average time a customer had to wait.
      void clockUpdate(int numTime)
      The clockUpdate function updates the clock by however many units of time it is passed.
      Customer currCustomer()
      The currCustomer function returns the current customer being served.
      int currWaiting()
      The currWaiting function returns the current number of people in the queue.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Testbed main function.
      int numPeopleNotWaited()
      The numPeopleNotWaited function returns the number of customers who did not have to wait.
      int numServed()
      The numServed function returns the number of people in total that were serviced.
      int returnTime()
      The returnTime function returns the current number the timer is on.
      Customer servComplete()
      The servComlpete function "completes" a customer and removes them from the queue.
      int totalWait()
      The totalWait function returns the total time waited by customers overall.

      • returnTime

        public int returnTime()
        The returnTime function returns the current number the timer is on.

        the number that the timer is on

        public Customer currCustomer()
        The currCustomer function returns the current customer being served.
        Returns:
        the customer being served

      • currWaiting

        public int currWaiting()
        The currWaiting function returns the current number of people in the queue.
        Returns:
        the number of people in the queue

      • Arrival

        public boolean Arrival()
        The Arrival function adds a customer onto the queue if it's not full. If the queue is currently full, it "rejects" the customer.
        Returns:
        true if added, false if queue is full

      • avgTimeWait

        public double avgTimeWait()
        The avgWaitTime function returns the average time a customer had to wait.
        Returns:
        the average amount of time a customer had to wait

      • totalWait

        public int totalWait()
        The totalWait function returns the total time waited by customers overall.
        Returns:
        the total time waited by all customers

      • numPeopleNotWaited

        public int numPeopleNotWaited()
        The numPeopleNotWaited function returns the number of customers who did not have to wait.
        Returns:
        the number of people who did not wait

      • numServed

        public int numServed()
        The numServed function returns the number of people in total that were serviced.
        Returns:
        the number of people who were served in total

      • clockUpdate

        public void clockUpdate(int numTime)
        The clockUpdate function updates the clock by however many units of time it is passed.
        Parameters:
        numTime - the number to update the clock by

      • servComplete

        public Customer servComplete()
        The servComlpete function "completes" a customer and removes them from the queue.
        Returns:
        the customer who was served

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Testbed main function. This function tests all methods in the Simulation class.
        Parameters:
        args - is unused
